title: Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually.
body:
Unable to connect to chat, you may reconnect manually.

EUNE server
Like 10 friends of mine have same issue and i see no exclamation mark so you maybe don't know.
Cheers {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Some players may be getting disconnected with chat on EUNE while we investigate a server issue.  We'll be posting updates through our[ status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune).  Hang tight!
looks good now it connected for me and my friend :p have fun on the FIELDS OF JUSTICE!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
